name: fireflies-workers
description: Split Cloudflare Workers for Fireflies ingestion pipeline

scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:ingest && npm run deploy:parser && npm run deploy:embedder && npm run deploy:extractor
scripts.secrets:set: echo 'Run: wrangler secret put <NAME> --cwd <worker-dir>' && echo 'Required secrets: SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY, OPENAI_API_KEY, FIREFLIES_API_KEY (ingest only)'
